metadata.name: #BathDayNFT　Gurulith Chan and Japan's Bath Day!
metadata.description:
February 6th is known as Bath Day in Japan. February is a very cold month. February is a very cold month, so let's warm up our frozen bodies by taking a relaxing soak in the bathtub!　 Gurulith Chan is also taking a bath with her friends while drinking snow water!　Oops, it's bad manners to wash clothes in the bath!

-Depending on the special occasion

2月6日は日本では風呂の日と呼ばれています。日本語の2と6の語呂合わせです。2月はとても寒い時期。ゆっくりと湯船に浸かって凍えた体を温めましょう!　 Gurulith Chanもお友達と一緒に雪見酒をしながら入浴中!　おっと、お風呂での洗濯はマナー違反です!　

-特別な日により

The first 15 people to renew their highest bid for this piece will receive #4 Gesyu's megaranica friends! BABY.
In addition, the winning bidder will receive an NFT of a "signed Gurulith Chan bath bromide" with your name engraved on it, minted and transferred by Polygon.　Let's make this a special day together!

この作品の最高額入札を更新した先着15名の方に、#4 Gesyu's megaranica friends! BABYを配布。
さらに落札者には貴方の名前が刻まれた「サイン入りGurulith Chanお風呂ブロマイド」のNFTをPolygonでミントしトランスファーします。　特別な日を一緒に盛り上げましょう!
